ProcessTemplates.Name: JSON file to CSV file
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will take the contents of a JSON file. It will convert the JSON into CSV format and then write the converted data to a file.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Full path of the input file to be read without filename."},"InFileName":{"Value":"\"example.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the input file to be read."},"InServerAddress":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.blob.core.windows.net\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Address of the input SFTP Server."},"InServerUser":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.sftp.frendstemplates\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"User for the input SFTP Server."},"InServerPassword":{"Value":"\"OinLoo6QEssEYzvqokPv6eJD8KUh2K4X\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Password the input SFTP Server."},"OutFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Full path of the output file to be written without filename."},"OutFileName":{"Value":"\"example.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the output file to be written"},"OutServerAddress":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.blob.core.windows.net\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Address of the output SFTP Server."},"OutServerUser":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.sftp.frendstemplates\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"User for the output SFTP Server."},"OutServerPassword":{"Value":"\"OinLoo6QEssEYzvqokPv6eJD8KUh2K4X\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Password the output SFTP Server."}}

Process.Name: JSON file to CSV file
Process.Description: This Process will take the contents of a JSON file. It will convert the JSON into CSV format and then write the converted data to a file.

id="Flow_0vua9r8" sourceRef="Activity_10llipw" targetRef="Activity_0wyt88l" /><bpmn2:group id="Group_0a3zjbx" categoryValueRef="CategoryValue_016zo76" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_14sil70"><bpmn2:text>Read the JSON file from SFTP server.
Input and connection parameters are set in process variables.
In the event of a failure, Task will be retried three times before throwing an exception and ending process.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1rvtlb7" sourceRef="Activity_08ieb5j" targetRef="TextAnnotation_14sil70" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_0pp5du4"><bpmn2:text>The file's content is parsed into JObject and added to a new JArray called "dataArray".</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1kmann3" sourceRef="Activity_0j6slbo" targetRef="TextAnnotation_0pp5du4" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_17w4x7p"><bpmn2:text>Iterating the content of "dataArray".
JSON object is flattened before added to JArray called "content".</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1bdl5k1" sourceRef="Activity_0wyt88l" targetRef="TextAnnotation_17w4x7p" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_0xo3w40"><bpmn2:text>Throw an exception if result of "Read File Contents from SFTP Server" was null, or the size of the file is less than 0 bytes.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_1xmlpvh" sourceRef="Event_0ou2vf3" targetRef="TextAnnotation_0xo3w40" /><bpmn2:group id="Group_168041r" categoryValueRef="CategoryValue_0ilgsb4" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_1mhnm28"><bpmn2:text>Using CSV Create Task to parse JSON to CSV.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_03cs798" sourceRef="Activity_115gayk" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1mhnm28" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_146nmm3"><bpmn2:text>Writing the CSV to SFTP server.
Input and connection parameters are set in process variables.
In the event of a failure, Task will be retried three times before throwing an exception and ending process.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_055cwy6" sourceRef="Activity_1241p78" targetRef="TextAnnotation_146nmm3" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_1l8jkdf"><bpmn2:text>Throw an exception if result of "SFTP Write CSV File" was null, or the size of the file is less than 0 bytes.</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_10ztlxn" sourceRef="Event_1u9ny1b" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1l8jkdf" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_1v2d4dr"><bpmn2:text>The process has been completed without errors..</bpmn2:text></bpmn2:textAnnotation><bpmn2:association id="Association_0g84iev" sourceRef="Event_0bjpqh9" targetRef="TextAnnotation_1v2d4dr" /><bpmn2:textAnnotation id="TextAnnotation_05s10e6"><bpmn2:text>Iterating the content of "dataArray".
